title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or translations and to score the response.

One point is awarded for each correctly answered simple subquestion. One point is awarded for each correctly answered part (A or B) of a complex subquestion.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately include any of the answers below.

· Subquestion 1 (one point)

· simile/ metaphor

· Subquestion 2[A] (one point)

· lead out/escort the young bees out

· stuff/pack/compress flowing honey

· swell/fill out/fill to bursting/fill/stretch the cells with sweet nectar; put/place sweet nectar in the cells

· receive the burdens of those arriving/coming in

· Subquestion 2[B] (one point)

· gentis adultos educunt fetus

· liquentia mella stipant

· dulci distendunt nectare cellas

· onera accipiunt venientum

· Subquestion 3[A] (one point)

· a line/column/procession (of battle) (having been) formed/made

· Subquestion 3[B] (one point)

· ablative absolute

· Subquestion 4 (one point)

· ignavum fucos pecus a praesepibus arcent

· spondee-spondee-dactyl-spondee-dactyl-spondee

· The line must be completely correct in its scansion. Copying of the Latin need not be perfect. The final foot can be rendered as a spondee or an anceps.

· The student may put long and short marks over the Latin syllables or write out the names of each metrical unit. If the student offers both styles of scansion and they do not match, the better version will count.

· Subquestion 5 (one point)

· The Punic War(s)/Carthaginian War(s)/Third Punic War

· Subquestion 6 (one point)

· Turnus
The response accurately includes one of the answers below.
The response accurately includes two of the answers below.
The response accurately includes three of the answers below.
The response accurately includes four of the answers below.
The response accurately includes five of the answers below.
The response accurately includes six of the answers below.
The response accurately includes seven of the answers below.
The response accurately includes all eight of the answers below.
